links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = Sum (p(i)*p(n+1-i)) i=1, ..., n where p(i) is the i-th prime.
prog: (PARI) {m=40;u=vector(m,x,prime(x));for(n=1,m,v=vecextract(u,concat("1..",n)); w=vector(n,x,u[n+1-x]);print1(v*w~,","))} - _Klaus Brockhaus_, Apr 28 2004(Haskell)a014342 n = a014342_list !! (n-1)a014342_list= f (tail a000040_list) [head a000040_list] 1 where   f (p:ps) qs k = sum (zipWith (*) qs $ reverse qs) :                   f ps (p : qs) (k + 1)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 07 2014, Mar 08 2012(MAGMA) [&+[NthPrime(n-i+1)*NthPrime(i): i in [1..n]]: n in [1..40]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Apr 12 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Felix Goldberg (felixg(AT)tx.technion.ac.il), Feb 01 2001
